name: Ramses Classic
summary: 'Ramses' is the original conversion of an amiga version developed in 1992, which deliberately left in the style of this period of time. Therefore all graphics and sounds are left unchanged to obtain the original retro look. Finish building your pyramid before your time is come. Get money and worker to reach this target. Because the original game was played with mouse and there where no problems with small operating elements, we must change the use for modern smartphones. On small screens we use a special zoom ability to extend the screen and the controls on it.
